suggestions.original: To improve the deformation dimension in the artwork, consider making the proportions of the figures more consistent. While the elongated limbs and expressive faces add to the whimsical nature, ensuring that all figures have a similar style of deformation will enhance the overall cohesiveness. Additionally, refining the shapes and sizes of the figures' limbs and facial features can help maintain a balanced and harmonious look. This will make the deformations appear more intentional and integrated into the overall composition.
